what_learn: What you will learn? The Bachelor of Commerce (International Business Accounting) programme is designed to provide comprehensive knowledge and skills in the field of accounting and finance. International Accounting Standards and their application in financial reporting. Managerial decision-making through cost analysis, budgeting, and performance measurement. Corporate Governance principles and their role in ensuring accountability and transparency Business Laws and regulations affecting financial transactions. Taxation principles and their application
